properties.description: Global IT solutions provider with 526 employees (Aug 2025); headquartered in Dubai, UAE; specializes in digital transformation consulting, AI, cloud, and automation services; supports clients in modernizing business processes through end-to-end technology adoption and innovation.
properties.content:
### How We Do Better

###### Tunecore

By Digital Services

##### Disrupting the world of music delivery, it's music to our ears.

##### Disrupting the world of music delivery, it's music to our ears.

How we transformed the music industry by, delivering the most nimble, futuristic and adaptable, distribution systems in the world.

[BUILD](https://sedintechnologies.com/case-study/tunecore)

###### Redsea

By Digital Commerce

##### Decoding what customers want today, we craft it with our unified experience approach.

##### Decoding what customers want today, we craft it with our unified experience approach.

How we re-engineered a unified e-commerce store by, decoding what customers want today. Faster. Smoother. Better.

[DECODE](https://sedintechnologies.com/case-study/redsea)

###### GAEA GLOBAL

By GenAI

##### We want to simplify systems and present their own data like an opportunity always.

##### We want to simplify systems and present their own data like an opportunity always.

GAEA Global leveraged GenAI to transform paper-based audit reports into digital assets, boosting efficiency and cutting costs.

[EMPOWER](https://sedintechnologies.com/case-study/gaea-global/)

### Spotlights

###### Spotlight

Dubai

##### GITEX Dubai 2023

##### GITEX Dubai 2023

GITEX Global 2023 is the epitome of tech evolution where groundbreaking technologies are unveiled, thought-provoking discussions take place, and industry trends are set. This annual gathering serves as a global hub for innovation, tech exploration, and networking, bringing together leading experts, visionaries, and enthusiasts from various industries.

[EXPLORE MORE](https://sedintechnologies.com/events/gitex-2024)

###### Spotlight

Las Vegas

##### OpenText

##### OpenText

Join us from November 18-21 at The Venetian Resort in Las Vegas for OpenText World, the premier conference for information management. Connect with experts, discover end-to-end solutions, and gain hands-on experience to help you work smarter and faster in the digital age.

[EXPLORE MORE](https://sedintechnologies.com/events/opentext-world-2024)

###### Spotlight

Bangalore

##### Bengaluru Tech summit

##### Bengaluru Tech summit

Bengaluru Tech Summit is Asia's largest technology conclave. From November 19-21, tech experts, thought leaders, and industry peers will converge at Bangalore Palace to drive innovation, foster collaboration, and explore transformative technologies across industries.

[EXPLORE MORE](https://sedintechnologies.com/events/bengaluru-tech-summit-2024)

### Highlights

##### Sedin unveils SedStart: A scriptless testing automation solution.

##### Sedin unveils SedStart: A scriptless testing automation solution.

Sedin Technologies, a global provider of innovative IT solutions, proudly announces launch of SedStart, a groundbreaking scriptless, no-code automation solution designed to streamline & enhance software testing processes for businesses of all sizes.

[READ MORE](https://www.techinasia.com/sedin-unveils-sedstart-revolutionary-scriptless-testing-automation-solution)

##### Sedin selects Melbourne headquarters for Australian expansion.

##### Sedin selects Melbourne headquarters for Australian expansion.

Melbourne, has been chosen as the headquarters for Sedin Technologies, a successful Indian IT solutions provider with an impressive global client list, for Australia and New Zealand with Steve de Mamiel appointed as Managing Director for the region.

[READ MORE](https://www.techbusinessnews.com.au/news/sedin-technologies-selects-melbourne-headquarters-for-australian-expansion/#google_vignette)

##### CRN: Indian IT provider Sedin Technologies announces Aussie ambitions.

##### CRN: Indian IT provider Sedin Technologies announces Aussie ambitions.

Indian IT services and solutions provider Sedin Technologies has expanded into the Australian and New Zealand market, announcing a new Melbourne office and regional managing director.

[READ MORE](https://www.crn.com.au/news/indian-it-provider-sedin-technologies-announces-aussie-ambitions-586657)

### Customer Stories

Reach out to craft
your digital transformation today.

[Enquire Now](https://sedintechnologies.com/contact-us)

company.name: Sedin Technologies
company.about: Global IT solutions provider with 526 employees (Aug 2025); headquartered in Dubai, UAE; specializes in digital transformation consulting, AI, cloud, and automation services; supports clients in modernizing business processes through end-to-end technology adoption and innovation.

evaluations.reasoning: Sedin Technologies is reported to have 526 employees as of Aug 01 2025 according to Tracxn, which falls squarely within the 501‑1000 range. LinkedIn also lists the company size as 501‑1,000 employees, corroborating the range. The internal profile lists 373 employees but also tags the company in the 501‑1000 category; the more recent Tracxn figure is the most reliable evidence that the company meets the criterion.

evaluations.criterion: Company is headquartered in the United Arab Emirates (UAE)
evaluations.reasoning: Sedin Technologies has a presence in the UAE. The search results show a contact address in Dubai, UAE (https://sedintechnologies.com/contact-us). Additionally, an article in Gulf News (https://gulfnews.com/business/corporate-news/sedin-technologies-establishes-middle-east-presence-to-drive-ai-led-digital-transformation-1.500165172) mentions the opening of a new office in the Middle East. While there are also offices in other countries, the presence in the UAE qualifies the company based on the criterion.

evaluations.criterion: Company provides digital transformation consulting services
evaluations.reasoning: Sedin Technologies’ own digital‑services page describes a technology‑consulting practice that guides clients through adopting, implementing and steering new technology to achieve measurable business outcomes.  The page lists case studies (TuneCore, Redsea, Gaea Global) that illustrate end‑to‑end digital‑transformation work such as modern e‑commerce, AI‑driven data processing and cloud‑based automation.  Independent reviews on Clutch note that Sedin “helps startups, SMBs and enterprises accelerate digital transformation,” and the AppExchange listing states the firm “helps businesses accelerate their digital transformation journey by leveraging Cloud and AI.”  These explicit statements and concrete examples satisfy the criterion of providing digital‑transformation consulting services.
